trans-unit.source: Represents a standard Windows horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 表示标准 Windows 水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Most controls that need scroll bars already provide them and do not require this control.
trans-unit.target: 需要已滚动条的大多数控件提供它们，并且不需要此控件。

trans-unit.source: This is true of a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, for example.
trans-unit.target: 这是 true 的多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，例如。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this control to implement scrolling in containers that do not provide their own scroll bars such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> or for user input of numeric data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此控件以实现在容器，如未提供其自己的滚动条中滚动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>或为数字数据的用户输入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>

trans-unit.source: The numeric data can be displayed in a control or used in code.
trans-unit.target: 可以在控件中显示或在代码中使用的数值数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> properties determine the range of values the user can select.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性确定用户可以选择的值的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking within the scroll bar but outside the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性确定单击滚动条中但在滚动框之外的效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking the scroll arrows at each end of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>属性确定单击控件的每一端的滚动箭头的效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar"></xref> class.
Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄时，请获取需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> ，其中包含需要的创建参数时创建该控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
